explains: adj. 怪诞的，奇怪的，可笑的；丑陋奇异的，奇形怪状的
n. （尤指书画中的）奇形怪状的人（或物）；奇异风格；（印刷）畸形字体

sentences.en: I felt it was a grotesque intrusion into our lives.
sentences.cn: 我觉得它对我们的生活是一种莫名其妙的侵扰。

sentences.en: They tried to avoid looking at his grotesque face and his crippled body.
sentences.cn: 他们尽量不去看他那丑陋的面庞和残疾的身躯。

sentences.en: It's grotesque to expect a person of her experience to work for so little money.
sentences.cn: 想让她那样有经验的人为这点钱工作真是荒唐。
